name: (microid)
description:
(microid) is the essence of the metroidvania genre, in a two-minutes game.

(All info is also in the game.)

Collect all power-ups, unlock habilities and find fuel for your spaceship!

(I bet you can't find the secret room 😉)

Controls: (keyboard / mouse / gamepad)

WASD / arrows / joystick -> move

spacebar / RMB / South gamepad button -> jump

v / LMB / West gamepad button -> shoot / charge shot
